properties.sql:
(SELECT sp.Id as id, FROM_UNIXTIME(floor(sact.activated/1000)) as dateCreated, sass.resourceid as resourceId, sact.Name AS Atividade, sp.Name AS Processo, dp.c_urgencia AS Urgencia, dp.c_nome_banco AS NomeBanco, dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NumeroWFBanco, dp.c_n_wf_pl as NumeroWFPL, dp.c_tipo_processo as TipoProcesso, dp.c_nome_cliente as NomeCliente, c_estado_contratacao AS EstadoContratacao, sact.Id AS ActivityId, from_unixtime(sact.LimitTime/1000, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as limittime, sla.c_data_inicio as DataInicio,sla.c_data_fim as DataFim, ip.c_nome AS Cliente
FROM shkprocesses sp
JOIN app_fd_info_diligencia d on sp.Id = d.id
LEFT JOIN shkprocessstates sps ON sps.oid = sp.State
LEFT JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
LEFT JOIN SHKActivityStates ssta ON ssta.oid = sact.State
LEFT JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
LEFT JOIN app_fd_processos p ON p.id = d.c_id_processo
LEFT JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
LEFT JOIN app_fd_sla_atividade sla ON sla.c_id_processo LIKE (SELECT sp2.Id
																FROM shkprocesses sp2
                                                                WHERE sp2.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id ORDER BY Created LIMIT 1)
LEFT JOIN app_fd_intervenientes_proc ip ON ip.c_id_processo = p.id
    AND ip.c_cliente_principal LIKE (SELECT i.c_cliente_principal 
										FROM app_fd_intervenientes_proc i 
                                        WHERE i.c_id_processo = p.id
                                        AND i.c_cliente_principal = 'CHECK')
WHERE sps.KeyValue LIKE 'open.running'
AND (ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.not_running.not_started' OR ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.running')
AND sass.resourceid LIKE '%#currentUser.username#%')
UNION
(SELECT sp.Id as id, FROM_UNIXTIME(floor(sact.activated/1000)) as dateCreated, sass.resourceid as resourceId, sact.Name AS Atividade, sp.Name AS Processo, dp.c_urgencia AS Urgencia, dp.c_nome_banco AS NomeBanco, dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NumeroWFBanco, dp.c_n_wf_pl as NumeroWFPL, dp.c_tipo_processo as TipoProcesso, dp.c_nome_cliente as NomeCliente, c_estado_contratacao AS EstadoContratacao, sact.Id AS ActivityId, from_unixtime(sact.LimitTime/1000, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as limittime, sla.c_data_inicio as DataInicio,sla.c_data_fim as DataFim, ip.c_nome AS Cliente
FROM shkprocesses sp
JOIN app_fd_processos p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
LEFT JOIN shkprocessstates sps ON sps.oid = sp.State
LEFT JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
LEFT JOIN SHKActivityStates ssta ON ssta.oid = sact.State
LEFT JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
LEFT JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
LEFT JOIN app_fd_sla_atividade sla ON sla.c_id_processo = sp.Id
LEFT JOIN app_fd_intervenientes_proc ip ON ip.c_id_processo = p.id
    AND ip.c_cliente_principal LIKE (SELECT i.c_cliente_principal 
										FROM app_fd_intervenientes_proc i 
                                        WHERE i.c_id_processo = p.id
                                        AND i.c_cliente_principal = 'CHECK')
WHERE sps.KeyValue LIKE 'open.running'
AND (ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.not_running.not_started' OR ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.running')
AND (c_estado_contratacao is null or c_estado_contratacao <> 'PND')
AND (sla.c_estado_atividade is null or sla.c_estado_atividade = 'Em curso')
AND sass.resourceid LIKE  '%#currentUser.username#%')
ORDER BY Urgencia DESC, DataFim ASC
